title: Valentine’s Day 4-page website with themed design and photo galleries

requirements.text: Create a 4-page Valentine’s Day themed website with consistent romantic styling (colors, typography, layout) across all pages.

quotes: I want to make a valentines day website with multiple pages and the color must be theamed accordingly

acceptanceCriteria: Site has 4 distinct pages/routes and a shared layout (header/nav and consistent styling).
Valentine’s theme uses a coherent palette (e.g., reds/pinks/cream) and consistent typography and spacing across pages.

requirements.text: Add simple navigation between the 4 pages (e.g., top nav and/or next/previous buttons) so the site can be viewed sequentially on mobile and desktop.
acceptanceCriteria: User can navigate to all 4 pages via visible UI controls without manually editing the URL.
Navigation highlights the current page or otherwise indicates where the user is in the sequence.

requirements.text: Add all uploaded images to the frontend as static assets and reference them by filename in the pages specified above (do not serve images through the backend).
acceptanceCriteria: All 11 uploaded images are included as frontend static assets and load correctly in the browser.
No backend calls are required to fetch or render the images.

requirements.text: Render the generated images listed in Image Requirements from frontend static assets (frontend/public/assets/generated) and use them in the UI (background/fallback visuals) consistently with the theme.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend.
Flower image is used on Page 3; background and favicon are applied site-wide where appropriate.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
Use English for any user-facing text in this build request; preserve the user-provided page copy exactly where specified for the website content.
nonGoals: User authentication (Internet Identity) and any login flow.
Persisting data on the backend or uploading images at runtime.
Integrations with external APIs or third-party services.
